name: Farewell Video Games
description:
Jam deadline version, I will be updating this quite a lot, but there's already a lot of fun stuff in there so check it out!

- Keyboard controls: Space, N, WASD. Tested on Xbox controller too.

- Hold down to use Horsebag

- Hold up when shooting to throw a collected item.

- Alt + Enter for fullscreen

With music by Antti Ylä-Rakkola
